import React from "react" import { memeData } from "../MemeData" const [url, urlFunc] = React.useState("") function getMemeImage(){ const memeArray = memeData.data.memes const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * memeArray.length) const url = memeArray[randomNumber].url return urlFunc( prevUrl=> url ) return(
) }
